properties.name: mp.jwt.verify.publickey
properties.description: Configuration property to specify the embedded key material of the verification public key for the MP-JWT signer in PKCS8 PEM or JWK(S) format. `mp.jwt.verify.publickey` will override other standard means to supply the Public Key.

properties.name: mp.jwt.verify.publickey.location
properties.description: Configuration property to specify the relative path or full URL of the verification public key.

properties.name: mp.jwt.verify.publickey.algorithm
properties.description: Configuration property to specify the Public Key Signature Algorithm property. The value can be set to either `RS256` or `ES256`, `RS256` is the default value.

properties.name: mp.jwt.decrypt.key.location
properties.description: Configuration property to specify the relative path or full URL of the decryption key.

properties.name: mp.jwt.verify.issuer
properties.description: Configuration property to specify the expected value of the `iss` claim.

properties.name: mp.jwt.token.header
properties.description: Configuration property to specify the `HTTP` header name expected to contain the JWT token.

properties.name: mp.jwt.token.cookie
properties.description: Configuration property to specify the Cookie name (default is `Bearer`) expected to contain the JWT token. This configuration will be ignored unless `mp.jwt.token.header` is set to `Cookie`.

properties.name: mp.jwt.verify.audiences
properties.description: Configuration property to specify the list of allowable value(s) for the `aud` claim, separated by commas. If specified, MP-JWT claim must be present and match one of the values.
